Futuristic Tower
未来之塔

Image by Crixel96
图片来自Crixel96



Reaching high into the sky, this futuristic tower by Crixel96 looks ready to blast off towards the stars. What do you think is inside? Here’s a hint: you may want to look through some of our previous Build With It articles to see if you can figure it out.
这座由Crixel96设计的未来建筑高耸入云，看起来就像是要飞往浩瀚星辰。你认为这座塔里有什么？提示：你可能需要看看我们之前发布的与之搭建系列博文来找到答案。

But now it’s your turn! What have you been building lately? Tell us all about it by sending some screenshots and information to FeatureMe@minecraft.net, and you might just see your creation featured here on Minecraft.net!
但现在是你的回合了！你最近造了什么建筑？发送你的建筑截图和相关信息到FeatureMe@minecraft.net来告诉我们吧，也许你就有机会看到你的作品展现在Minecraft.net！
